text: allaah ne ek misaal pesh kee hai: ek gulaam hai, jisapar doosare ka adhikaar hai, use kisee cheez par adhikaar praapt nahin. isake vipareet ek vah vyakti hai, jise hamane apanee or se achchhee rozee pradaan kee hai, phir vah usamen se khule aur chhipe kharch karata hai. to kya ve paraspar samaan hai? prashansa allaah ke lie hai! kintu unamen adhikatar log jaanate nahin
